description: Morisato Keiichi is a 21-year-old Engineering student at Nekomi Technical Institute. He has a natural aptitude for anything mechanical, and is brilliant when it comes to engineering. Keiichi is a member of the NIT Motor Club. Keiichi is a good person with a good heart. He is nice to everyone regardless of how they treat him or what they do. He is very forgiving of Skuld and Urd; despite the amount of trouble and grief they cause him.
name: Morisato Keiichi
